item.title: 카밀라(CAMILA) - RED LIPS (레드 립스)
item.description:
Tears began to spill
out of his eyes
Always I put red
lipstick on my mind

spotlight

don’t lie

lipstick

가둬 둘게
in red lips
No one

더 이상

item.title: 카밀라(CAMILA) - 넘어가 (Take Me Home)
